name: Todo List
description: Simple task management - add, complete, and delete todos
backend_requirements: Todo model with SQLAlchemy: id, title (string, required), completed (boolean, default False), created_at
REST API endpoints: GET /api/todos (list all), POST /api/todos (create), PUT /api/todos/:id (update), DELETE /api/todos/:id
JSON responses with proper status codes (200, 201, 404)
frontend_requirements: Display todo list with title and checkbox for completion status
Input field with 'Add' button to create new todos
Click checkbox to toggle completed state
Delete button per todo with confirmation
Show empty state when no todos exist
